argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mrcfval.f | |- F = ( mrCls ` C ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_mrcidb | |- ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) -> ( U e. C <-> ( F ` U ) = U ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ U C_ X ) -> ( U e. C <-> ( F ` U ) = U ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_mrcssid | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ U C_ X ) -> U C_ ( F ` U ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_biantrud | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ U C_ X ) -> ( ( F ` U ) C_ U <-> ( ( F ` U ) C_ U /\ U C_ ( F ` U ) ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqss | |- ( ( F ` U ) = U <-> ( ( F ` U ) C_ U /\ U C_ ( F ` U ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl6rbbr | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ U C_ X ) -> ( ( F ` U ) = U <-> ( F ` U ) C_ U ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_bitrd | |- ( ( C e. ( Moore ` X ) /\ U C_ X ) -> ( U e. C <-> ( F ` U ) C_ U ) ) |
